gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeProductServiceDelivery` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeProductServiceDelivery')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeProductServiceDelivery return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeProductServiceDeliveryCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeProductServiceDeliveryCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeProductServiceDeliveryDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeProductServiceDeliveryBreakdownNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeProductServiceDeliveryDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
